tool_description:
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Data Provider. 🕒 REAL-TIME product data API you’ve been looking for. No manual rules or web-scraper maintenance is required.

Subscribe to the FREE trial to test it out. Bear in mind, that we’re still working things out, functionalities are updated on regular bases, and more will be added soon. 👷 Work in Progress… Ask for the Endpoints you need. CUSTOM plans available.
name: Lazada DataHub
title: Lazada DataHub

api_list.name: Lazada - Item Search by Image
api_list.description:
Complete Item Search Endpoint. Supported sites from Singapore, Vietnam, Thailand, Indonesia, Philippines, and Malaysia.

If you need more filtering options, send a request.

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description:
Supported Sites:
- Philippines **`PH`**:  [www.lazada.com.ph](https://www.lazada.com.ph)
- Singapore **`SG`**: [www.lazada.sg](https://www.lazada.sg)
- Indonesia **`ID`**: [www.lazada.co.id](https://www.lazada.co.id)
- Malaysia **`MY`**: [www.lazada.com.my](https://www.lazada.com.my)
- Thailand **`TH`**: [www.lazada.co.th](https://www.lazada.co.th)
- Vietnam **`VN`**: [www.lazada.vn](https://www.lazada.vn)

optional_parameters.name: imgRegion
optional_parameters.description:
Image Region is the search focus position from the given image. Eg.: 120,45,190,150

![https://i.ibb.co/QmphdGT/img-Region-jpg.png](https://i.ibb.co/QmphdGT/img-Region-jpg.png)

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
Available options for each **region** parameter:
- Philippines **`PH`**:  `en_US` 
- Singapore **`SG`**: `en_SG`; `zn_CN`
- Indonesia **`ID`**: `en_US`; `id_ID`
- Malaysia **`MY`**: `en_MY`  ; `zn_CN`  ; ` ms_MY`
- Thailand **`TH`**: `en_US`; `th_TH`
- Vietnam **`VN`**: `en_SG`; `vi_VN`
